name: Explosion Labs | SAE Game Jam 2021 (May)
description:
You play as test subject No.4253201. Make it to the end without dying.

Controls:

Mouse Control

Keyboard Control

- AD for left/right movement

- Spacebar for Jumping

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

My first ever game jam. 

This has mostly been a learning experience for me as I've just started making games and overall it was pretty fun.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

KNOWN BUGS

- Will sometimes randomly detect player multiple times on detonation

- Dialog box collider is messing up the explosion detection at the start of the level

- Thrown gun still blocks player movement

- Laser visuals do not fire
